message.content:
Enkosi! Ndiyakwazi ukuncomekayo. Ndiza kukuncedisa ngokukhetha iityhefu nendlela yokuzisebenzisa amanzi. Ndiza kukuncedisa ngokukhetha iityhefu ngokwesibini:

1. Xhosa: Ndifuna ityhefu yokungena emanzini.
   - Sicela uqaphele ukuba ityhefu engenayo yeyokungena emanzini futhi ayifani nokuthi uyiyiphi isisindo.
   - Uthole ityhefu enokungena emanzini engaphelele isisindo sakho. Sicela uqaphele ukuba uyithengise kwi-ndawo entsha kuphela nokuba kufanele ukuthi uhlale uyithengise.
   - Phakamisa ityhefu emanzini ngokunciphisa ngaphantsi kwemisebenzi yokubamba ngokupheleleyo. Sicela uqaphele ukuba ulindele ityhefu yokungena emanzini ingcambiselele phambi kwesikhala sakho.

2. Xhosa: Ndingafumana iityhefu zokuhlanza amanzi.
   - Sicela uqaphele ukuba uzithengelele kwi-ndawo entsha yomhlaba wakho. Sicela uqaphele ukuba uqaphele ukuba iityhefu ezifumanekayo zokuhlanza amanzi ziyafana nokuba uyisapho lwakho.
   - Xhumana nesikhala sokuzimelele nokuqaphele ukuba uqondele kwimisebenzi yakho yokuhlanza amanzi. Sicela uqaphele ukuba ulindele iityhefu zokuhlanza amanzi zingcambiselele phambi kwesikhala sakho.

Ngokwesithathu, ndiza kukuncedisa ngendlela yokuzisebenzisa amanzi:

1. Xhosa: Ndingafuna ukuzisebenzisa iityhe
